description:
A soft organic cotton long sleeved tee, that does its part to keep future generations comfortable. Made from 100% Regenerative Organic Certified cotton this shirt’s fabric comes from farms that adhere to the highest standard of organic farming.

  • ROC™ cotton aims to rehabilitate soil, respect animal welfare and improve the lives of farmers. ROC farms reduce greenhouse gas emissions and could help trap more carbon than conventional agriculture
  • Organic cotton wears well and feels great
  • Taped shoulder seams are more comfortable and improve fit retention
  • Regular fit wears just like you hoped it would
name: Patagonia LS Regenerative Organic Certified Cotton P-6 T-Shirt - Youths
